name: libproxy-node
description: A nodejs native addon for libproxy

scripts.build-libproxy: mkdir build-libproxy && cd build-libproxy && mkdir install && cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=install -DMODULE_INSTALL_DIR=install/modules -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=MinSizeRel -DWITH_PERL=no -DWITH_PYTHON2=no -DWITH_PYTHON3=no && make && make install
scripts.publish: npm run build-libproxy && node-pre-gyp-github rebuild package publish
